Package edu.uconn.cse.adder

Core Adder library package.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdderInteger
    Arbitrary-precision integers for modular arithmetic.
    Context
    Encapsulates random number generator used by the AdderInteger class.
    Election
    Represents an election.
    ElgamalCiphertext
    Represents a vote, and optionally, the corresponding proof.
    MembershipProof
    Represents a membership proof.
    Polynomial
    Represents a polynomial.
    PrivateKey
    Represents a private key.
    PublicKey
    Represents a public key.
    Util
    Miscellaneous static utility methods.
    Vote  
    VoteProof  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidElgamalCiphertextException
    Thrown by the fromString method of a ElgamalCiphertext to indicate that there was a parse error.
    InvalidMembershipProofException
    Thrown by the fromString method of a MembershipProof to indicate that there was a parse error.
    InvalidPolynomialException
    Thrown by the fromString method of a Polynomial to indicate that there was a parse error.
    InvalidPrivateKeyException
    Thrown by the fromString method of a PrivateKey to indicate that there was a parse error.
    InvalidPublicKeyException
    Thrown by the fromString method of a PublicKey to indicate that there was a parse error.
    InvalidVoteException
    Thrown by the fromString method of a Vote to indicate that there was a parse error.
    SearchSpaceExhaustedException
    Thrown by the getFinalSum method of a Election to indicate that the search space has been exhausted.
